description: Company submitted loan application with basic business information.
Underwriter requested detailed financial statements for the past 12 months.
Company provided required financial statements showing operational history.
Disclosed that CFO and Operations Director left the company within past 90 days.
Industry analysis shows physical retailers in sector losing 12% market share annually to e-commerce.
Company made 15-day late payment on existing equipment loan.
Detailed debt restructuring and business turnaround plan requested.
Loan application declined due to declining financial performance and industry outlook.
